name: Ocean Party
description: Ocean Party is a fresh spin on the matching puzzle genre that’s sure to delight puzzle lovers. Battle comical monsters and villains as you take on 200+ intricately designed stages (and more on the way). The game features simple swipe controls but deceptively challenging gameplay. With unique win conditions for each stage and over 10 different barrier blocks to play around, Ocean Party is more than just your average puzzle mobile game.
